entry.title: Builds on GCE environment are failing
entry.content:
Jun 2, 22:33 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 2, 12:49 PDT
Identified - There is an ongoing issue with Google Compute Engine: https://status.cloud.google.com/incident/compute/19003

entry.title: GitHub webhooks delayed delivery
entry.content:
May 22, 13:52 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 22, 11:16 PDT
Monitoring - GitHub incident: https://www.githubstatus.com/incidents/nf4gcjtcsqdb

entry.title: Intermittent nuget packages restore issues
entry.content:
May 2, 17:17 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 2, 14:15 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

May 2, 14:15 PDT
Identified - Problem is related to the network infrastructure problems ion Azure West US (https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/status/).

entry.title: GitHub webhooks rejection
entry.content:
Apr 24, 06:57 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 24, 06:24 PDT
Monitoring - The allowed webhook IP addresses range has been updated and GitHub webhooks should be working again. We apologize for the inconveniences caused by this incident!

Apr 24, 06:22 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Slow response and builds are queued
entry.content:
Mar 18, 20:09 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 18, 15:23 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 18, 08:28 PDT
Identified - There was a huge number of ongoing malicious requests to AppVeyor exploiting certain functionality and degrading AppVeyor database performance.

Mar 18, 06:52 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Builds are not starting
entry.content:
Jan 29, 20:31 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 29, 20:03 PST
Monitoring - AppVeyor has been affected by network infrastructure issues on Azure in West US region: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/status/
It looks like the service is getting back up and we are monitoring it.

Jan 29, 18:24 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 29, 18:04 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: AppVeyor is not available
entry.content:
Jan 16, 19:35 PST
Resolved - It's been resolved. The problem was a database migration during AppVeyor update preventing roles from a normal start. Sorry for the inconveniences caused by this issue.

Jan 16, 18:53 PST
Investigating - We are investigating.

entry.title: Errors provisioning build VMs on GCE cloud
entry.content:
Jan 1, 16:53 PST
Resolved - Primary build environment has been recovered.

Jan 1, 14:23 PST
Identified - Customers see "Cannot assign job to clouds/groups 'pro, pro-backup'. All clouds within the group are either failing, or offline, or busy." error on failed build details. There was a power issue in our primary data center. We are currently performing recovery procedure.

entry.title: NuGet restore issues
entry.content:
Dec 30, 09:42 PST
Resolved - The issues has been fixed.

Dec 29, 15:03 PST
Identified - We are observing the errors in all build environments while restoring NuGet packages during the builds. NuGet team has confirmed the issue on their status page: https://status.nuget.org/ which is related to CDN provider service degradation in North America: https://status.verizondigitalmedia.com/#network-status

entry.title: Issues with switching node version
entry.content:
Nov 11, 08:23 PST
Resolved - We have switched node version manager to download a feed from a healthy blob.

Nov 11, 05:33 PST
Identified - 'install-Product node ' fails with 'Unable to connect to the remote server' error.
Root cause of the problem is unresponsive Azure blob container. We are working with Azure on restoring the functionality.

entry.title: Sporadic errors accessing build cache
entry.content:
Nov 6, 11:20 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 2, 11:16 PDT
Identified - The issue has re-occurred. We are still working with our hosting provider to resolve it.

entry.title: AppVeyor cannot list repositories for GitHub App authorization
entry.content:
Nov 2, 16:14 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 2, 12:13 PDT
Monitoring - It should be working now.

Nov 2, 10:24 PDT
Identified - GitHub is experiencing issues: https://status.github.com/messages

entry.title: Sporadic errors accessing build cache
entry.content:
Nov 2, 10:22 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 2, 08:16 PDT
Investigating - We are observing sporadic 403 (Forbidden) errors in builds working with build cache. We notified our hosting provider about the issue and are awaiting for their response.

entry.title: GitHub is having major issue
entry.content:
Oct 22, 16:45 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 22, 06:45 PDT
Monitoring - https://status.github.com/messages

entry.title: AppVeyor builds are queued
entry.content:
Oct 22, 16:45 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 22, 13:39 PDT
Update - We are still seeing the huge queue. It will take more time to drain it to the normal state. Sorry about inconveniences.

Oct 22, 13:05 PDT
Monitoring - We've resolved the issue with queued builds.

Oct 22, 12:39 PDT
Identified - AppVeyor builds are delayed because of increased webhook calls from GitHub. We are working on clearing up the queue.

entry.title: NuGet restores return 503 error
entry.content:
Sep 27, 13:23 PDT
Resolved - NuGet.org is no longer degraded.

Sep 27, 07:57 PDT
Investigating - We are receiving reports from customers that nuget restores from v2 feed sporadically return 503 Service Unavailable errors. An issue filed on NuGet Gallery project: https://github.com/NuGet/Home/issues/7333

entry.title: Slow and intermittent chocolatey downloads
entry.content:
Sep 12, 14:39 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 12, 10:29 PDT
Monitoring - Customers can experiences unstable chocolatey downloads. Please watch http://status.chocolatey.org/.
As a workaround add 'appveyor-retry' before 'choco install'

entry.title: Intermittent errors while uploading artifacts to Google storage
entry.content:
Sep 4, 17:24 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 4, 08:53 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 4, 06:59 PDT
Identified - There is an ongoing incident on GCP: https://status.cloud.google.com/incident/storage/1800

Sep 4, 06:55 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Intermittent issues with Chocolatey packages installation
entry.content:
Aug 21, 14:47 PDT
Resolved - Chocolatey maintenance completed.

Aug 21, 12:45 PDT
Identified - Chocolatey is performing maintenance (https://twitter.com/chocolateynuget/status/1031915993646424067).
To workaround or at least decrease error rate, add 'appveyor-retry' before 'choco install'

entry.title: AppVeyor nuget feed timeouts
entry.content:
Aug 17, 12:00 PDT
Resolved - Users experienced intermittent timeouts why restoring nuget packages hosted on AppVeyor project and account feeds.

entry.title: Slow cloning from GitHub
entry.content:
Jul 17, 12:32 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 16, 10:13 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jul 15, 20:16 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Intermittent networking issues
entry.content:
Jul 13, 10:01 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 13, 08:52 PDT
Monitoring - The fix has been applied.

Jul 13, 08:12 PDT
Investigating - Some customers are reporting about intermittent connectivity issues in their builds.

entry.title: GitLab projects cannot be added and built
entry.content:
Jun 8, 00:36 PDT
Resolved - GitLab API V4 support implemented and deployed

Jun 7, 07:57 PDT
Investigating - GitLab discontinued API V3 support which AppVeyor uses. We are working on fix.

entry.title: Network maintenance
entry.content:
Apr 28, 01:00 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 27, 19:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 26, 16:07 PDT
Scheduled - The data center hosting AppVeyor primary build environment will be performing a scheduled maintenance of networking equipment. There would be few moments of downtime. During that time the builds will be automatically switched to our backup build environment hosted on GCE.

entry.title: Nuget package restore failures
entry.content:
Mar 22, 05:18 PDT
Resolved - nuget.org up and running.

Mar 22, 03:15 PDT
Identified - Nuget.org experiencing an outage. Check https://status.nuget.org for details.
